item.title: The Separation: Inside the Unraveling U.S.-Ukraine Partnership
item.description: As President Trump sought a peace deal and Vladimir V. Putin sought victory, factions in the White House and Pentagon bled the Ukrainian war efforts.

item.title: Crew Paints Russian Flag on Oil Tanker Pursued by the U.S. Coast Guard
item.description: The U.S. military tried to intercept the Bella 1 last week in the Caribbean Sea as it headed to Venezuela to pick up oil.
